sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
Le vray portraict du pere du peuple. Et le grand support de la France. A agé de 75 ans. Pelletier, Pierre, fl. 1610.
1 sheet ([1] p.) : ill. (port.)
De l'imprimerie de Claude Morlot, A Paris : le 15. Octobre 1648.
Attributed to Pierre Pelletier. Consists of two sonnets: the first has title 'La France a monsieur De Broussel, conseiller du Roy en sa Cour de Parlement de Paris'; the second has title 'A monsieur De Broussel, conseiller du Roy en sa Cour de Parlement de Paris'. With engraved portrait of Pierre de Broussel. Both sonnets signed: DV Pelletier. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======

Consists of two sonnets: the first has title 'La France a monsieur De Broussel, conseiller du Roy en sa Cour de Parlement de Paris'; the second has title 'A monsieur De Broussel, conseiller du Roy en sa Cour de Parlement de Paris'. With engraved portrait of Pierre de Broussel. Both sonnets signed: DV Pelletier. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
